mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AT_FIELD_REL( MENU_CODE, R_NAME, PRIVILEGETYPE, FID, UID, ISUSERGROUP, OPERATOR, REMARK ) VALUES( #{menuCode}, #{rname}, #{privilegeType}, #{fid}, #{uid}, #{isUserGroup}, #{operator}, #{remark} )
mapper.select: SELECT c.ID as id, MENU_CODE as menuCode, R_NAME as rname, PRIVILEGETYPE as privilegeType, FID as fid, UID as uid, ISUSERGROUP as isUserGroup, OPERATOR as operator, CREATE_TIME as createTime, UPDATE_TIME as updateTime, REMARK as remark FROM AT_FIELD_REL c WHERE c.ID=#{id}

SELECT c.ID as id, MENU_CODE as menuCode, R_NAME as rname, PRIVILEGETYPE as privilegeType, FID as fid, UID as uid, ISUSERGROUP as isUserGroup, OPERATOR as operator, CREATE_TIME as createTime, UPDATE_TIME as updateTime, REMARK as remark FROM AT_FIELD_REL c ORDER BY createTime

SELECT afd.F_NAME as fname afr.ID as id, afr.MENU_CODE as menuCode, afr.R_NAME as rname, afr.PRIVILEGETYPE as privilegeType, afr.FID as fid, afr.UID as uid, afr.ISUSERGROUP as isUserGroup, afr.OPERATOR as operator, afr.CREATE_TIME as createTime, afr.UPDATE_TIME as updateTime, afr.REMARK as remark FROM AT_FIELD_REL afr, AT_SYS_MODEL asm, AT_FIELD_DICT afd WHERE asm.TREE_ID = #{treeId} AND asm.MENU_CODE = afr.MENU_CODE AND afr.MENU_CODE = afd.MENU_CODE AND afr.FID = afd.ID AND afr.UID = #{uid}

SELECT afd.ID as id, afd.MENU_CODE as menuCode, afd.F_NAME as fname, afd.F_TITLE as ftitle, afd.ORDER_INDEX as orderIndex, afd.IS_SYSTEM as isSystem, afd.IS_INAUTH as isInauth, afd.IS_HASREAD as isHasread, afd.IS_HASUPDATE as isHasupdate, afd.VIEW_TYPE as viewType, afd.CATE_GORY as cateGory, afd.ID_PARENT as idParent, afd.F_DESC as fdesc, afd.CREATE_TIME as createTime, afd.UPDATE_TIME as updateTime, afd.REMARK as remark FROM AT_FIELD_DICT afd WHERE
ID = #{dictIds}

SELECT asm.M_NAME as mname, afd.ID as id, afd.MENU_CODE as menuCode, afd.F_NAME as fname, afd.F_TITLE as ftitle, afd.ORDER_INDEX as orderIndex, afd.IS_SYSTEM as isSystem, afd.IS_INAUTH as isInauth, afd.IS_HASREAD as isHasread, afd.IS_HASUPDATE as isHasupdate, afd.VIEW_TYPE as viewType, afd.CATE_GORY as cateGory, afd.ID_PARENT as idParent, afd.F_DESC as fdesc, afd.CREATE_TIME as createTime, afd.UPDATE_TIME as updateTime, afd.REMARK as remark FROM AT_FIELD_REL afr, AT_SYS_MODEL asm, AT_FIELD_DICT afd WHERE asm.MENU_CODE = afr.MENU_CODE AND afr.MENU_CODE = afd.MENU_CODE AND afr.FID = afd.ID AND afr.UID = #{uid}
